T02D3217:220a-1: ku ru kull'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3217:220a-4: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi yi
T02D3217:220a-5: ge hr'i: las byung ba'i autpala dmar po'i dbus na
T02D3217:220a-6: yi ge hr'i: gnas par bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3217:220a-7: de dag yongs su gyur pa las 'phags ma ku ru kulle ste /
T02D3217:220a-8: sku mdog dmar po padma dang zla ba dmar po'i gdan can /
T02D3217:220a-9: 'od zer dmar po khor yug tu 'khyil ba /
T02D3217:220a-10: kha dog dmar po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bsnams pa /
T02D3217:220a-11: dbu rgyan snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02D3217:220a-13: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis autpala dmar po'i mda' mde'u
T02D3217:220a-14: dang rna ba'i mthar thug par 'then pas rnam par
T02D3217:220a-15: mdzes pa'i me tog gi gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02D3217:220a-16: g-yon pas sdong bu dang bcas shing kha bye ba'i autpala dmar po bsnams pa'o ;
T02D3217:220a-17: / g-yas pas ni mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D3217:220a-18: cher 'jo zhing sgeg pa'i nyams kyis 'gyur ldog dang
T02D3217:220a-19: ldan par dmigs la ye shes sems dpa' dang gcig
T02D3217:220a-20: tu byas te / rang gi lus kyi 'od zer spros pa'i lcags kyus drangs pa'i lha dang /
T02D3217:220a-21: lha ma yin dang bya khyung dang /
T02D3217:220b-3: skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs brgya phrag dang /
T02D3217:220b-4: stong phrag la sogs pa rnams lus rab tu 'dud par byed cing /
T02D3217:220b-5: shin tu gus pa dang ldan pas mchog tu dbang
T02D3217:220b-6: du gyur pas phyogs bcu rnams su legs par lta
T02D3217:220b-8: aom ku ru kulle hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02D3217:220b-9: bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3217:220b-10: 'bum phrag nas brtsams nas ji srid mthar thug pa
T02D3217:220b-11: med pas bcom ldan 'das ma mngon du bya ba'o
T02D3217:220b-12: // de nas 'ga' zhig dbang du byed par 'dod
T02D3217:220b-13: pas bzlas pa 'bum phrag byas shing ji skad du
T02D3217:220b-14: bshad pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas te /
T02D3217:220b-15: gus pas rab tu 'dud par byed pa'i lha dang
T02D3217:220b-16: lha ma yin la sogs pa'i dbus su gnas pa'i
T02D3217:220b-17: bdag nyid kyi lus kyi 'od zer gyis drangs pa'i
T02D3217:220b-18: bsgrub bya mdun du legs par bzhag la /
T02D3217:220b-19: rang gi snying gar autpala dmar po 'dab ma bcu
T02D3217:220b-20: drug pa de'i snying la yang rnam par bsams te
T02D3217:220b-21: / 'phags pa rdo rje lus med las bshad pa'i
T02D3217:220b-22: rim pa ltar byung ba dang lcags kyu bsgoms pas
T02D3217:220b-23: de'i ming gi yi ge rang gi snying ga'i sngags
T02D3217:220b-24: kyis dang por kun nas mnan nas /
T02D3217:220b-25: de bzhin du mdas snying phug cing chags pa chen po mos par gyur pa dang /
T02D3217:220b-26: gzhus rgang pa gnyis dang autpala'i zhags pas kyang ske
T02D3217:220b-27: ba bcings shing kun nas drangs pas rang gi rkang
T02D3217:220b-28: pa gnyis kyi drung du bsgyel bar bya'o //
T02D3217:220b-29: gal te skyes pa yin na ni lcags kyus snying phug par bya ba'o //
T02D3217:220b-30: ji ste bud med yin na ni chos 'byung nas so //
T02D3217:220b-31: aom ku ru kulle che ge mo 'am che ge
T02D3217:220b-32: mo yang rung ste kun nas khug cig hr'i: sv'a
T02D3217:220b-33: h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3217:220b-34: bsgrub bya kun nas drangs la yang sngags nyid kyis
T02D3217:220b-35: dbang du gyis shig ces bar du bcug pas bzlas
T02D3217:220b-36: par bya'o // brgya bzlas pas ni tha mal pa'i skyes pa dang /
T02D3217:220b-39: blon po yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D3217:220b-40: khris ni skye dgu'i 'jig rten pa rnams so //
T02D3217:220b-42: 'bum phrag bdun gyis ni lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams kyang ngo /
T02D3217:220b-43: bye bas ni bya khyung dang rab brtan la sogs pa'i lha'i bud 'gro rnams dang /
T02D3217:221a-2: dus ring por gus pa dang bcas shing rgyun mi
T02D3217:221a-3: chad pas mtha' yas par bzlas pas ni sa gsum
T02D3217:221a-4: ka yang dbang du byed par 'gyur ba yin no
T02D3217:221a-5: // ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs so //
